recipes.name: Pasta Perfection
instructions: Mix flour and egg to form pasta dough; knead until smooth, then rest 30 minutes.
Roll dough thin and cut into fettuccine strips.
Boil pasta in salted water for 2-3 minutes until al dente; drain.
Sauté garlic in olive oil, add crushed tomatoes, and simmer 10 minutes.
Toss pasta with sauce, season with salt, pepper, and basil.
Plate and garnish with extra basil for photo.

recipes.name: Vegan Dessert Delight
instructions: Scoop avocado flesh into a blender.
Add cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla, and salt; blend until smooth.
Spoon mousse into serving cups and chill for 1 hour.
Garnish with fresh berries for vibrant presentation.
Snap a photo of your dessert masterpiece.

recipes.name: Midnight Breakfast Showdown
instructions: Mix pancake batter with cinnamon; cook into fluffy pancakes.
Whisk eggs with cream, cook low and slow into a custard-like scramble.
Toast bread and spread with cream cheese mixed with honey.
Arrange pancakes, eggs, and toast on a board under dim lighting.
Photograph the sweet-savory spread.

recipes.name: Homemade Pizza Party
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, and water; knead into dough and let rise 1 hour.
Roll out dough into a circle.
Spread tomato sauce, add mozzarella, mushrooms, and basil.
Bake at 220°C for 12-15 minutes until crust is crisp.
Slice and photograph the bubbly pizza.

recipes.name: Bake Your Own Bread
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and sugar in a bowl.
Add warm water and knead into a smooth dough, about 10 minutes.
Cover and let rise for 1 hour until doubled.
Shape into a loaf, place on a baking sheet, and bake at 200°C for 25 minutes.
Cool slightly, slice, and serve warm with butter.

recipes.name: Salad Reinvention
instructions: Toss quinoa, lettuce, chickpeas, and apple slices in a large bowl.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for vinaigrette.
Drizzle vinaigrette over salad and mix gently.
Arrange for vibrant color and texture.
Serve as a hearty main dish.

recipes.name: Sweet Treat Without Oven
instructions: Layer yogurt in a glass or bowl.
Add a layer of granola for crunch.
Top with mixed berries and chia seeds.
Drizzle honey over the top.
Chill for 10 minutes and serve with a vibrant photo.

recipes.name: Submarine Sandwich Showdown
instructions: Slice and toast hoagie roll lightly.
Spread mayonnaise and mustard on both sides.
Layer turkey, cheese, lettuce, and tomato.
Close sandwich and press gently to meld flavors.
Cut in half and photograph the textured layers.

recipes.name: Koththu Remix
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and add onion and carrot; sauté 3 minutes.
Add cabbage and chicken, stir-fry 2 minutes.
Toss in chopped paratha and garam masala.
Add tomato sauce and mix well.
Cook until crispy and serve hot.
